name: Escape Code - Tap Puzzle Adventure
description:
To escape the island is pretty simple: Enter a 6 digit code into the keypad.

Finding the escape code is a different story.

Search the island for tools to open up areas to solve puzzles. Use the clues you find to put together the escape code.

Features:
- Easy to pick and play
- Loads of puzzles to tantalise your mind
- Solve puzzles in any order
- Super graphics
- Inventory, Help dialogue

Hints:

- Using tools:
To use tools, first tap it in your inventory then tap on the object you want to use it on in the scene.

- Puzzle Pieces:
Tap on a piece in you inventory will add it to the puzzle.

- Using keypads:
Tap on the numbers to enter. Use star or hash keys to rest the keypad.
